db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: AnimationGroup type is used to group multiple animations so that they can act as one animation. The position set to the group is also set to all animations in a group. The duration is the maximum of the individual animations. The animations can be any supported animation type and do not have to have the same name.

db:section.db:title: animations : list<AbstractAnimation>
db:section.db:para: Holds the list of animations in the animation group.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] duration : real
db:section.db:para: Holds the maximum duration of the animations in the group.

db:section.db:title: name : string
db:section.db:para: Holds the name of the animation group.
